justification: Rationale focuses only on Team A’s needs (RB weakness, TE depth) and ignores Team B’s preferences. B values rookie/committee RBs and strength of schedule—Josh Garcia fits both—so he’s unlikely to be moved for an injured, low-tier TE (Justin Wright). While trading TE depth for RB help is structurally coherent, the valuation and injury context make acceptance implausible. Explanation is brief and lacks B-centric reasoning.
